“CREATIVE JEWEL” Name itself speaks about the Creativity of our Jewellery.\nManufacturer of Rhodium, Casting, Handmade & Cz Fancy Jewellery with all New concepts. Stockist of 91.6 Gold Jewellery & Other Melting as Per Order(Client Requirements)
Welcome to Creative Jewel Mobile Application.

Here you will find a complete guide on how to use application.

Volumes:

In all we have total 3 volumes that you can browse through, Volume one is open and can viewed by all user who have installed this app without registering. For rest volumes you need to Register First. You can find the Registration option by just doing a right swipe in left hand side corner.

After you have successfully registered you need to login to continue viewing the remaining Volumes.

Once you have opened the volumes just slide to view design in those particular volumes. If you like a particular design just click it. You can Zoom the design as well.

Order:

Below the Zoom option there are some check boxes that you can select, check the boxes corresponding the designed you have liked and want to order.

Fill in the order in the order's Instruction by clicking on instruction tab, and complete all information as they are mandatory. Then add that item to cart. You can add as many item to your cart as you want.

Then to view your cart click on the cart button on the top menu bar. Click send Inquiry to submit your order.

New Arrival:

New Arrival is the section for our new collection that we introduce on timely basis. Keep checking the new arrival by clicking on the new tab or keep an eye on our notification.
